duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform dental hygiene procedures, ensuring optimal oral health through cleaning, scaling, and root planning.
Take and develop dental x-rays in strict adherence to safety protocols.
Educate patients on effective oral hygiene techniques, promoting long-lasting dental health.
Conduct oral cancer screenings and implement preventive measures.
Provide chair-side support and assist during dental procedures.
Maintain accurate patient records and treatment plans.
Adhere to infection control and sterilization procedures.
Collaborate with the dental team to deliver exceptional patient care and positive treatment outcomes.
Provide nutritional counseling and self-care programs to prevent disease.
